Posts


  • Implement automatic spellchecking on your static blog - Nov 30, 2019

    static learning webdev

    Have you ever made a huge spelling error on your blog and never noticed? It’s a common mistake I’ve done because errors are hard to check for in markdown files. This post will teach you how to use Continuous Integration to find spelling mistakes in your posts and even get tips on how to improve your writing.

  • How to add a comments section to your static blog - Nov 11, 2019

    learning static

    Usually, blogs store comment data inside their server database. You can’t do that with static websites but there are many tools that can help you solve this problem and create discussion around your posts. This article will guide you through two ways you can add these comments for free.
